summary: CONSUMER RIGHT FRONT TIRE BLEW OUT THE SIDEWALL EXPOSING STEEL BELTS. *TS *** NAR RECEIVED 9-29-05***  THE TIRE WAS REPLACED WITH THE NEW FULL SIZE SPARE.  ALMOST A MONTH LATER THE RIGHT FRONT TIRE BLEWOUT AGAIN LEAVING A 2 INCH HOLE IN THE TREAD.  THIS WAS THE ORIGINAL SPARE WHICH HAD LESS THAN 2000 MILE ON IT.  SIX DAY LATER THE LEFT REAR TIRE BLEWOUT LEAVING A 1 INCH HOLE IN THE TREAD OF THE TIRE.  (2004 SPORTSMASTER 194T TRAVEL TRAILER) (5 ORIGINAL CARLISLE ST RADIAL ST250/75R14 LOAD C).  *NM
